text: Jerome Michael Adams (born September 22, 1974) is an American anesthesiologist. He was the 20th Surgeon General of the United States from September 2017 to January 2021. Before assuming his current role, he served as the Indiana State Health Commissioner from 2014 to 2017. On June 29, 2017, President Donald Trump nominated Adams to become Surgeon General of the United States. Adams was confirmed by the United States Senate on August 3, 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jerome Adams' Twitter Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:American physicians Category:Surgeon Generals of the United States Category:Scientists from New Jersey Category:People from Orange, New Jersey Category:Scientists from Maryland Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Politicians from Maryland
title: Jerome Adams
